nl.rug.search.odr.ws.connection
Class AuthorizedWebServiceFacade

java.lang.Object
  nl.rug.search.odr.ws.connection.UnauthorizedWebServiceFacade
      nl.rug.search.odr.ws.connection.AuthorizedWebServiceFacade

public class AuthorizedWebServiceFacade
extends UnauthorizedWebServiceFacade

Use this class to access functionality of the Open Decision Repository which requires authentication. Please note that all methods may throw a WebServiceException when you provide invalid data, e.g., invalid decision states or references entities which don't exist in the ODR.

Author:
Stefan, Ben Ripkens

Constructor Detail

AuthorizedWebServiceFacade

public AuthorizedWebServiceFacade(String baseUrl,
                                  String email,
                                  String password)
Create a new instance. Please note that no connection will be established on object creation. Instead, this will be done on subsequent method calls. This class is threadsafe and may be reused. The user credentials will be verified once a method is used which requires authentication.

Parameters:
baseUrl - URL of the ODR, e.g., http://www.decisionrepository.com or http://localhost:8080.
email - The user's email address which will be used for authentication purposes.
password - The user's password which will be used for authentication purposes.
Method Detail

getProjectOverview

public List<ProjectOverviewDTO> getProjectOverview()
                                            throws IOException
Retrieve an overview over all the projects in which the user is involved in.

Returns:
A list of project overviews, i.e., a short summary of each project.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

getProject

public ProjectDTO getProject(long projectId)
                      throws IOException
Retrieve details about a specific project. This includes information about project members, concerns, iterations and decisions.

Parameters:
projectId - The project id identifies the project for which information should be retrieved. Project IDs may be retrieved using the getProjectOverview() method.
Returns:
Details about the project.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

getDecision

public DecisionDTO getDecision(long projectId,
                               long decisionId)
                        throws IOException
Retrieve information about a specific decisions including all the decision's histories.

Parameters:
projectId - The project id identifies the project for which information should be retrieved. Project IDs may be retrieved using the getProjectOverview() method.
decisionId - A decision's ID. The decision must belong to the project.
Returns:
Details about the decision.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

addRating

public void addRating(long projectId,
                      RatingDTO rating)
               throws IOException
Add a rating to the project. Decisions can be rated regarding certain concerns. For instance, you might defined that Java has a very positive effect on a portability concern. To update a rating, simply call this method again.

Parameters:
projectId - The project to which the rating should be added.
rating - The actual rating information which will be send to the server.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

addDecision

public DecisionDTO addDecision(long projectId,
                               EditDecisionDTO decision)
                        throws IOException
Add a decision to the project.

Parameters:
projectId - The project to which the decision should be added.
decision - Information about the decision which should be added to the project.
Returns:
A complete DecisionDTO which can be used for further processing.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs

updateDecision

public void updateDecision(long projectId,
                           EditDecisionDTO decision)
                    throws IOException
Update a decision through the web service. If you change the decision's state, then a new history entry will be created for this decision. All referenced decisions should already be stored in the ODR otherwise an exception will be thrown.

Parameters:
projectId - The project to which the decision should be added.
decision - Information about the decision which should be updated.
Throws:
IOException - if an I/O exception occurs
